CMDataModelValidator.php

00001 <?php
00002 
00003 include_once("CMValidator.php");
00004 
00010 class CMDataModelValidator extends CMValidator {
00011  
00017  public static function Version() {
00018   return "1.0";
00019  }
00020  
00026  public static function Since() {
00027   return "1.0";
00028  }
00029  
00035  public function CMDataModelValidator($rules) {
00036   $this->addRules($rules);
00037  }
00038  
00045  public function addRules($rules) {
00046   if(is_array($rules))
00047    $parts = $rules;
00048   else $parts = explode(' ', $rules);
00049   
00050   foreach($parts as $p) {
00051    $p = trim($p);
00052    if($p == '') continue;
00053    $this->addRule($p);
00054   }
00055   
00056   return true;
00057  }
00058  
00065  public function appendRule($rule) {
00066   $newrule = array(
00067    'field' => false,
00068    'mandatory' => false,
00069    'empty' => false,
00070    'type' => false, // false, 'email', 'number'
00071   );
00072   
00073   for($i = 0; $i < strlen($rule); ++$i) {
00074    $c = substr($rule, $i, 1);
00075    if(ctype_alnum($c)) {
00076     $newrule['field'] = substr($rule, $i);
00077     array_push($this->rules, $newrule);
00078     return true;
00079    }
00080    
00081    if($c == '+')
00082     $newrule['mandatory'] = true;
00083    elseif($c == '-')
00084     $newrule['empty'] = true;
00085    elseif($c == '@')
00086     $newrule['type'] = 'email';
00087    elseif($c == '#')
00088     $newrule['type'] = 'number';
00089   }
00090   
00091   return true;
00092  }
00093  
00101  public function validate($dm = false) {
00102   $this->invalidFields = array();
00103   
00104   foreach($this->rules as $rule) {
00105    list($name, $value) = $dm->extractNameValue($rule['field']);
00106    
00107    // the rule must exist in the pool
00108    if($value === NULL)
00109     $this->invalidFields[$name]['missing'] = "Field was not posted";
00110    
00111    // check a mandatory field has a value
00112    if($rule['mandatory'] && trim($value) == '')
00113     $this->invalidFields[$name]['mandatory'] = "This field is mandatory";
00114    
00115    // check a blank field is blank
00116    if($rule['empty'] && trim($value) == '')
00117     $this->invalidFields[$name]['empty'] = "This field must be empty";
00118   
00119    // validate email
00120    if($rule['type'] == "email" && !$this->isValidEmail($value))
00121     $this->invalidFields[$name]['email'] = "Not a valid email address";
00122   
00123    // validate number
00124    if($rule['type'] == "number" && !$this->isValidNumber($value))
00125     $this->invalidFields[$name]['number'] = "Not a number";
00126   }
00127   
00128   return $this->isValid();
00129  }
00130  
00134  public function __toString() {
00135   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00136  }
00137  
00138 }
